Format conversion classes used by the color classes
[Datatypes for the VIEW framework]


Classes

class  BALL::VIEW::ColorMap
class  BALL::VIEW::ColorUnit
class  BALL::VIEW::ColorUnitHue

Detailed Description

These two classes are used by ColorRGBA and ColorHSV . They allow them to use different types of input parameters like integers, floats or even strings (numbers in hex format).
